TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/FrameBottom extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Window::FrameBottom abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the bottom border of a window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameBottom> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the bottom border of a window.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Active As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the bottom border of an active window.
Docs.value: A that represents the bottom border of an active window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameBottom.Active%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameBottom.Active%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowFrameBottom1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#355](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#355)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#355](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#355)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Inactive As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the bottom border of an inactive window.
Docs.value: A that represents the bottom border of an inactive window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameBottom.Inactive%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameBottom.Inactive%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowFrameBottom1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#356](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#356)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#356](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#356)]
